content.question: Students in Ms. Hollingsworth’s classroom could earn a coupon for every ten minutes they spent working on a project. When they accumulated five coupons, they could pick out a favorite book and read it for fifteen minutes during free time. Ms. Hollingsworth’s approach to getting students to complete their projects involves what application of operant conditioning?

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
